labels.shortDescription: Opportunity Owner New Lead Chatter Notification Text
labels.value: {0}, A customer you are actively working with on an Equipment Finance Opportunity has also submitted a new Working Capital Loan Digital request. The Working Capital Loan Digital request has been assigned to the Express Team for follow up. Months in Profession must be populated when Equipment is Medical and Decision Status is Approved.

If Upfront Tax Code is entered: Upfront Tax Paid To, Upfront Tax Method, Responsibility Code, Upfront State Tax Amount, Upfront County Transit Tax Amount, Upfront County Tax Amount, Upfront City Transit Tax Amount, Upfront City Tax Amount, and Total Upfront Tax Amount are required
First Payment cannot exceed 20% of equipment Cost
Gross Finance cannot be more than 50% of equipment cost
Interim Rent values from Opportunity, Misc Invoices, and Blended Inc items must all match before boooking.
If Invoice Code is not Suppressed, bank information must be cleared out, when submitting to InfoLease
If Invoice Code is Suppressed, bank information must be provided
